message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for you, available for just $10000. It's a one-time opportunity, so don't miss out! This product is high-quality and I believe it will be a great investment for you. What do you say?

Thanks for the offer, Alice. However, given that there's no prior sales record and the risk of getting a low-quality product is high, I'm going to pass on this one.  Maybe I'll consider it if I see other buyers purchasing and getting good results.
